name: Accounting Software with Google Sheets
description:
An accounting software built with HTML, CSS and Google Apps Script as frond-end and Google Sheets as back-end. A easy to use and customizable template.

The template consists of

  1. Dashboard with P&L view
  2. Dashboard with Expenses breakdown
  3. Dashboard with Invoice selector
  4. HTML form to entry expenses
  5. HTML form to entry invoices

Try it, before you buy it - https://rebrand.ly/fsythome

Reach out to me for any difficulties in setting up.
